name: CyberConnect
introduce: CyberConnect is a decentralized social network, that enables developers to create social applications empowering users to own their digital identity, content, connections, and monetization channels. It consists of three user-focused features: CyberProfile, a decentralized identity standard that provides access to web3; and, CyberConnect Social Graph, which links users' digital identity, data, content, and friends; and CyberWallet, a smart contract wallet that provides an easy onboarding to web3 social experience.
